artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Published by Iseya Kanekichi; Carved by Yokogawa Takejirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: portrait of an old man with white hair and beard, with end of beard tied with yellow cord; man has grimacing expression; yellow eyes; man wears garment with dark and light linear patterning and fabric with green ground and yellow and orange dragons; landscape behind figure with mountain in ULQ, trees and market stall with flowers and white and purple checkerboard roof in ULQ
marks: in the red rectangle: {Kiichihōgen} | (Ōnakatomi\'s in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Ōnakatomi's Poem and Kiichihōgen
